channel.title: RUNEXSCAPE - Simple help question for no-ip.com. Please help. Thanks
channel.description:
I am the owner of RuneXscape (running on hamachi -.-). How can I change it so that it runs on no-ip.com? i already have an account, and a website host (www.runexscape.servehttp.com) and downloaded it, now what?
If you can help me properly, thatd be great! THANKS!
EDITED:
That tut was f-ed up in the @$$. Ok, this is what I did step by step:
No-ip.com Made host, www.runexscape.no-ip.info Launch my server Went to moparscape, type in the address URL above, first http://, then www, just it just alone, NO LUCK!
WTF?

item.title: RUNEXSCAPE - Simple help question for no-ip.com. Please help. Thanks
item.dc:creator: @runeXscape runeXscape
item.description:
@runeXscape wrote:

I am the owner of RuneXscape (running on hamachi -.-). How can I change it so that it runs on no-ip.com? i already have an account, and a website host (www.runexscape.servehttp.com) and downloaded it, now what?

If you can help me properly, thatd be great! THANKS!

EDITED:

That tut was f-ed up in the @$$. Ok, this is what I did step by step:

No-ip.com
Made host, www.runexscape.no-ip.info
Launch my server
Went to moparscape, type in the address URL above, first http://, then www, just it just alone, NO LUCK!

WTF?

Read full topic
